items.title: Compilation error on aarch64 (v0.9.0): cannot find type `Sse2PackedDouble` et al.
items.body:
We compile octasine for aarch64 in [our CI](https://ci.cbix.de/osam-cologne/archlinux-proaudio/1331/2/3) for building Arch binary packages.

Version 0.9.0 fails to compile on aarch64 due to the error shown below:

Compilation on x86_64 is fine and previous versions compiled on aarch64 too, after some fixes you did, IIRC.
 
```
   Compiling octasine-cli v0.9.0 (/tmp/build/octasine/src/OctaSine-0.9.0/octasine-cli)
error[E0412]: cannot find type `Sse2PackedDouble` in module `octasine::simd`
  --> octasine-cli/src/plot.rs:49:44
   |
49 |     let sse2 = make_plot::<octasine::simd::Sse2PackedDouble>("red");
   |                                            ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ help: a trait with a similar name exists: `SimdPackedDouble`
   |
  ::: /usr/src/debug/octasine/OctaSine-0.9.0/octasine/src/simd/mod.rs:21:1
   |
21 | pub trait SimdPackedDouble: Copy + Add + AddAssign + Sub + Mul {
   | -------------------------------------------------------------- similarly named trait `SimdPackedDouble` defined here

error[E0412]: cannot find type `AvxPackedDouble` in module `octasine::simd`
  --> octasine-cli/src/plot.rs:50:43
   |
50 |     let avx = make_plot::<octasine::simd::AvxPackedDouble>("blue");
   |                                           ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ help: a trait with a similar name exists: `SimdPackedDouble`
   |
  ::: /usr/src/debug/octasine/OctaSine-0.9.0/octasine/src/simd/mod.rs:21:1
   |
21 | pub trait SimdPackedDouble: Copy + Add + AddAssign + Sub + Mul {
   | -------------------------------------------------------------- similarly named trait `SimdPackedDouble` defined here

error[E0412]: cannot find type `Sse2PackedDouble` in module `octasine::simd`
  --> octasine-cli/src/plot.rs:88:44
   |
88 |     let sse2 = make_plot::<octasine::simd::Sse2PackedDouble>("red");
   |                                            ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ help: a trait with a similar name exists: `SimdPackedDouble`
   |
  ::: /usr/src/debug/octasine/OctaSine-0.9.0/octasine/src/simd/mod.rs:21:1
   |
21 | pub trait SimdPackedDouble: Copy + Add + AddAssign + Sub + Mul {
   | -------------------------------------------------------------- similarly named trait `SimdPackedDouble` defined here

error[E0412]: cannot find type `AvxPackedDouble` in module `octasine::simd`
  --> octasine-cli/src/plot.rs:89:43
   |
89 |     let avx = make_plot::<octasine::simd::AvxPackedDouble>("blue");
   |                                           ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ help: a trait with a similar name exists: `SimdPackedDouble`
   |
  ::: /usr/src/debug/octasine/OctaSine-0.9.0/octasine/src/simd/mod.rs:21:1
   |
21 | pub trait SimdPackedDouble: Copy + Add + AddAssign + Sub + Mul {
   | -------------------------------------------------------------- similarly named trait `SimdPackedDouble` defined here

error[E0412]: cannot find type `Sse2PackedDouble` in module `octasine::simd`
   --> octasine-cli/src/plot.rs:127:44
    |
127 |     let sse2 = make_plot::<octasine::simd::Sse2PackedDouble>("red");
    |                                            ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ help: a trait with a similar name exists: `SimdPackedDouble`
    |
   ::: /usr/src/debug/octasine/OctaSine-0.9.0/octasine/src/simd/mod.rs:21:1
    |
21  | pub trait SimdPackedDouble: Copy + Add + AddAssign + Sub + Mul {
    | -------------------------------------------------------------- similarly named trait `SimdPackedDouble` defined here

error[E0412]: cannot find type `AvxPackedDouble` in module `octasine::simd`
   --> octasine-cli/src/plot.rs:128:43
    |
128 |     let avx = make_plot::<octasine::simd::AvxPackedDouble>("blue");
    |                                           ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ help: a trait with a similar name exists: `SimdPackedDouble`
    |
   ::: /usr/src/debug/octasine/OctaSine-0.9.0/octasine/src/simd/mod.rs:21:1
    |
21  | pub trait SimdPackedDouble: Copy + Add + AddAssign + Sub + Mul {
    | -------------------------------------------------------------- similarly named trait `SimdPackedDouble` defined here

For more information about this error, try `rustc --explain E0412`.
error: could not compile `octasine-cli` (bin "octasine-cli" test) due to 6 previous errors
warning: build failed, waiting for other jobs to finish...
```
